Mendag: Ekspor Nikel Harus Sesuai Aturan, Tak Bisa Dihambat
07 Nov 2019, 10:22 by Anisa Indraini


Foto: Agus Suparmanto (Andhika/detikcom)

Jakarta - Sejumlah Menteri Kabinet Kerja Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) siang ini menggelar rapat koordinasi (rakor) di Kantor Menteri Koordinator Kemaritiman Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan, Jakarta Pusat. Berdasarkan jadwal Luhut, rapat membahas soal pelarangan ekspor bijih nikel.Lantas, apa hasilnya?Ditemui usai rapat, Menteri Perdagangan Agus Suparmanto mengatakan, ekspor nikel harus dijalankan sesuai aturan. Jika dijalankan sesuai aturan, maka siapapun tidak bisa menghambat."Jadi begini, ekspor nikel ini kita meluruskan aturan yang ada. Kalo ekspor ini sesuai aturan, ya kita nggak bisa menghambat. Jadi harus sesuai aturan," ucap Agus di kantor Luhut, Kamis (7/11/2019).Agus sendiri belum bisa memberikan keterangan jelas terkait kelanjutan ekspor nikel yang saat ini sedang disetop sementara.Sementara, Kepala Badan Koordinasi Penanaman Modal (BKPM) Bahlil Lahadalia mengatakan, kelanjutan nasib ekspor nikel akan dibahas Senin pekan depan dengan pengusaha nikel. Dia belum bisa banyak komentar karena buru-buru meninggalkan lokasi."Saya lagi rakor di DPR nih. Nanti hari Senin ya hari Senin. Nanti ada rapat lagi kami tindak lanjut nanti di BKPM antara BKPM dengan pengusaha nikel. Nanti keputusannya nanti di sana," ujarnya.Simak Video "Mengungkap Desa 'Siluman' Penyedot Anggaran"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)

Minister of Trade: Nickel Exports Must Be in Accordance with Rules, Cannot be Obstructed
Nov 7, 2019, 10:22 by Anisa Indraini


Photo: Agus Suparmanto (Andhika / detikcom)

Jakarta - A number of the President's Working Cabinet Ministers Joko Widodo (Jokowi) this afternoon held a coordination meeting (coordination meeting) at the Office of the Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan, Central Jakarta. Based on Luhut's schedule, the meeting discussed the ban on the export of nickel ore. Then, what was the result? Met after the meeting, Trade Minister Agus Suparmanto said, nickel exports must be carried out according to the rules. If it is carried out according to the rules, then anyone can not inhibit it. "So like this, we can straighten out the nickel export. If the export is according to the rules, yes we cannot inhibit it. So it must be according to the rules," Agus said in the Luhut office, Thursday ( 7/11/2019). Agus himself has not been able to provide clear information related to the continuation of nickel exports which are currently being temporarily stopped. Meanwhile, the Head of the Investment Coordinating Board (BKPM) Bahlil Lahadalia said, the continuation of the fate of nickel exports will be discussed next Monday with entrepreneurs nickel. He hasn't been able to comment much because he hurriedly left the location. "I am holding a coordination meeting at the DPR. Later Monday, Monday. Later there will be a meeting again, we will follow up later at BKPM between BKPM and nickel entrepreneurs. Later the decision will be there," he said.
